actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO profiles (membership_id, profile_image, profile_name, email, tagline, public_contact_info, password_hash, role_id)
VALUES
(
		{{appsmith.store.user.membership_id}},
		{{inp_image.model.image ? inp_image.model.image : NaN }},
    '{{inp_name.text.replace(new RegExp("'", "gm"), "''")}}',
    '{{inp_email.text.replace(new RegExp("'", "gm"), "''")}}',
		'{{inp_tagline.text.replace(new RegExp("'", "gm"), "''")}}',
		'{{inp_contact_info.text.replace(new RegExp("'", "gm"), "''")}}',
		'{{passwordHasing.createHash(inp_password.text)}}',
		2
)
